message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about using reinforcement learning to improve neural machine translation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the challenges of training deep models and large datasets, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of neural networks, which is a common technique in cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed method on translation tasks, which may also fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) as image captioning and visual question answering tasks often involve translation.
